thread.title: Chrissy Teigen lip-syncing Ordinary People to John Legend for Valentine's Day is ULTIMATE couple goals
thread.title_full: Chrissy Teigen lip-syncing Ordinary People to John Legend for Valentine's Day is ULTIMATE couple goals

author: Vicki Newman
title: Chrissy Teigen lip-syncing Ordinary People to John Legend for Valentine's Day is ULTIMATE couple goals
text:
Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Chrissy Teigen and John Legend are already one of the most beautiful couples on the planet - and now this! 
The married couple have shown the world exactly how madly in love with each other they are by making a romantic music video. 
The 38-year-old singer and his model wife, who have nine-month-old daughter Luna together, starred in a special Valentine's Day video for LOVE magazine . 
In the sweet video, Chrissy mouths the words to her husband's famous track as he watches her lovingly. Read More Chrissy and John are so cute together (Photo: Rankin for LOVE) She looks so sexy in the video (Photo: Rankin for LOVE) 
Showing off a series of different looks in a number of skimpy lingerie sets, Chrissy looks amazing! She shows off her enviable figure in the barely-there ensembles, including one outfit that's made up of nipple tassles and not much else. 
John, who's wearing a black T-shirt and leather jacket, even joins in the lip-sync at one point, but it's definitely Chrissy who steals the show this time. 
He's one lucky fella! Read More Chrissy definitely steals the show this time (Photo: Rankin for LOVE) She shows off her enviable figure in a series of skimpy outfits (Photo: Rankin for LOVE) 
The romantic video gives out ultimate couple goals! Those guys are just so cute together. 
We're not jealous ... well, maybe a little bit. 
The video was directed by Rankin with creative direction from LOVE editor-in-chief Katie Grand. 
She said: "Rankin had pitched karaoke of Chrissy singing John Legend and I was scared she wouldn't want to do that, and I pitched Marilyn, which Rankin was into, but then she turned up and didn't want to sing Marilyn, but she wanted to get John Legend over and sing to himâ€¦" Chrissy and John are so in love (Photo: Rankin for LOVE) They're ultimate couple goals!
